nodes.text: Nebula Communications security offices was the office of the Nebula Communications security company located in the Upper Industrial Sector on Nar Shaddaa during the Cold War. During the Great Hunt, a Hunter assaulted the Nebula Communications in search of their security expert Zee K'lin.
Nebula Communications appear as an area on Nar Shaddaa in the 2011 massively multiplayer online roleplaying video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
